revised_title: The Coefficients of Capacity and Attraction or Repulsion of Two Electrified Spherical Conductors
tldr: The authors present a simplified method for calculating the electrostatic energy and attractive or repulsive forces between two electrified spherical conductors, particularly useful when the spheres are close together. The formulae derived can be used to calculate capacity coefficients and force between the conductors, providing a practical solution for engineers working with spark systems of wireless telegraphy.
